text: The Billsborough House, at 376 6th Avenue East North in Kalispell, Montana, was built in 1914. It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1994. It is a one-and-a-half-story side-gabled Craftsman-style house, with large front and rear dormers and wide bracket-supported eaves. As of 1994 at least the roof was covered with wood shingles. The property includes a two-car garage built before 1927. title: Billsborough House
